text: In this video,

we will show you how to
build a mansion step by step

and also share some
creative building ideas
and tips along the way.
Use the clickable sections below

to keep track of what step
you're on in this video.
Starting out,

you will need to find or
terraform an area of land
where you want to build your mansion on.
Next, plan the layout of your build
by setting a foundation.
For this build,

we will have the main part of
the building in the middle,
and we'll add an extension on each side.

For the walls, we will be
using white terra-cotta

and gray concrete for
the sides of windows.
Make sure you leave spaces for windows

and the main entrance
while adding the walls.

The main part of the building
will contain two floors,
and the sides will only have one floor.
For the roof, we will be using

polished blackstone brick
stairs and quartz stairs.

The blackstone stairs
will be the main roof,

and the quartz stairs
will be used as a frame.
Fill in the spaces you left for windows
using your choice of glass.
To spice up the build,
we'll add some windows on the roofs.
For the floor inside the mansion,
we will use cyan terra-cotta
to add a nice contrast against the walls.

Now that the exterior of
the build is complete,
we can move on to the interior.

We'll start by sectioning
the mansion into rooms.

Next, we'll add stairs that
go to the second floor.
Starting with the kitchen,

we'll use some counters
along the walls using quartz.

You can create a functioning
fridge by placing a barrel
and an iron block on top of it.
Then add an iron door and a button.
You can use a cauldron for the sink.
And you can add functional shelves
using barrels and trapdoors.
Moving on to the bedroom,
you can make a closet
by placing trapdoors on the sides
with armor stands inside.
And add barrels for extra storage.

You can create a bookshelf
using stairs and slabs
with actual bookshelves behind them

to give an illusion of
a more 3D bookshelf.
The next step is the living room.
You can build a sofa using wool and slabs.

And you can add a
fireplace using campfires.
You can create lamps using an end rod

with a zombie or skeleton
head on top of it.
And if you wish,

you can add a dining
room inside your mansion.
Finish up the interior however you like.

For the exterior, we'll add
an archway for the entrance.

We'll also add some
windowsills under the windows

with flowers to add more
detail to the build.
And to finish off the mansion,

we'll be adding a fountain,
some plants, and paths.
